room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did Something in the Woods with a group of 5 and had a great experience. The room was put together very well. The puzzles were very engaging and challenging, but not frustratingly so. We will definitely be coming back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did the woods room. I loved the dark. The clues were well laid out and it inspired team work. I cant wait to try out vegas room and the xmas room too when they get that running. Thank you for an enjoyable evening. On a side note David was an awesome employee. Loved his personality and energy he gave!Go Connerton Crazies!

room_title: Escape room "There’s Something in the Woods" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: Sooo much fun and friendly staff that really care about your experience!!! We had such a great time in the woods themed room.
